# Alvison Hunter - Software Engineer

## Professional Summary
Full-Stack Software Engineer specializing in scalable web applications, modern frontend frameworks, and cloud-native backend solutions with 6+ years of experience in web development, delivering scalable, secure, and high-performance applications.

## Portfolio Projects

### MGT Insurance Onboarding
Contributed to property and liability insurance onboarding software for business clients.
**Tech Stack:** Next, TypeScript, Amplitude, Intercom Messenger, Mantine Library, Zod, Auth0, AgentSync, Salesforce, DocuSign, ProducerSync API, HubSpot

### Udemy
Delivered enhancements to the pricing page with improved filtering, sorting, & new enhanced shopping cart features.
**Tech Stack:** React, Django, Python, Next.js, TypeScript, GraphQL, Tailwind CSS, Material UI, Sentry IO

### Amni Network
Collaborated on GMP compliance software with quote generation and sales order management features.
**Tech Stack:** React, Context API, Internal API, TypeScript, Material UI, Datadog

### Catalis
Helped develop modernization of legacy court and land records systems into modern web applications.
**Tech Stack:** NextJS, TypeScript, ASP.NET Web API, Tailwind CSS, Material UI, Axios

### TrueHold
Implemented sale-leaseback software with home equity calculation and financial analysis tools.
**Tech Stack:** NextJS, TypeScript, Llama API, Tailwind CSS, Material UI, Spring Boot, Java, PostgreSQL

### Chatlingual
Designed and built front-end integrations for customer service platforms with multi-language translation.
**Tech Stack:** React, Redux, TypeScript, SalesForce Lightning, Zendesk, LivePerson, GenesysCloud, DeepL API
